title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather and analyze requirements for the MemoryEnhancementStimulator. This includes understanding user needs, functional specifications, and non-functional requirements. Collaborate with the team to ensure all requirements are clearly defined, prioritized, and documented in a comprehensive Requirements Document (RD). Once completed, share the RD for further review and refinement.

title: Design MemoryEnhancementStimulator Architecture
description: Design the architecture for the MemoryEnhancementStimulator. This includes hardware and software design, as well as user interface design.

title: Develop Hardware Components
description: Design and develop the hardware components of the MemoryEnhancementStimulator. This includes brain stimulation devices, sensors, and power sources.

title: Develop Software Components
description: Develop the software components of the MemoryEnhancementStimulator. This includes firmware, mobile app, and web interface.

title: Integration of Hardware and Software Components
description: Integrate the developed hardware and software components to create a functioning MemoryEnhancementStimulator.

title: Perform Unit Tests
description: Perform unit tests on the developed hardware and software components to ensure they function correctly.
dependencies: Integration of Hardware and Software Components

title: Perform System Tests
description: Perform system tests on the MemoryEnhancementStimulator to ensure it functions correctly as a whole.

title: Security Audit and Vulnerability Testing
description: Conduct a security audit and vulnerability testing on the MemoryEnhancementStimulator to ensure it is secure.
dependencies: Integration of Hardware and Software Components

title: Documentation and Knowledge Transfer
description: Compile comprehensive documentation for the MemoryEnhancementStimulator, including user manuals, technical specifications, safety guidelines, troubleshooting guides, and assembly instructions (if applicable). Perform knowledge transfer sessions to relevant stakeholders, including but not limited to users, healthcare professionals, and technical support staff. Ensure that the documentation is clear, concise, and accessible for all users regardless of their technical background. To ensure quality and consistency, include sections on best practices for using the device, common issues, and FAQs. Review and update documentation regularly based on user feedback and new features.
dependencies: Integration of Hardware and Software Components

title: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
description: Conduct user acceptance testing on the MemoryEnhancementStimulator to ensure it meets user requirements.

title: Product Deployment and Launch
description: Deploy the MemoryEnhancementStimulator for production use and launch it to the market.
